member.summary: Provides an implementation of the GetRotationReferencePoints method for this AnnCrossProductEditDesigner object.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner
member.summary: Defines the base class for all of the designers in the annotation toolkit.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.#ctor(Leadtools.Annotations.Core.IAnnAutomationControl,Leadtools.Annotations.Core.AnnContainer,Leadtools.Annotations.Core.AnnObject)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of AnnDesigner with the specified parameters.
member.param: The automation control associated with this designer.
The container to use. Must not be **null**.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.Cancel
member.summary: Cancels the current designer operation.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.End
member.summary: Ends this designer.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.GetRenderer
member.summary: Gets the object that is used to render the TargetObject.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.Invalidate(Leadtools.LeadRectD)
member.summary: Manually invalidates this designer.
member.param: The region to invalidate. If the value of this parameter is LeadRectD.Empty, then the entire surface is invalidated.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.OnPointerDoubleClick(Leadtools.Annotations.Core.AnnContainer,Leadtools.Annotations.Core.AnnPointerEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles pointer double-click events on the designer.
member.param: The container associated with this designer.
member.returns: Derived classes should override this method in order to process pointer double-click events on the container. The designer should return **true** if it handled this event in any way.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.OnPointerDown(Leadtools.Annotations.Core.AnnContainer,Leadtools.Annotations.Core.AnnPointerEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles pointer down events on the designer.
member.param: The container associated with this designer.
member.returns: Derived classes should override this method in order to process pointer down events on the container. The designer should return **true** if it handled this event in any way.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.OnPointerMove(Leadtools.Annotations.Core.AnnContainer,Leadtools.Annotations.Core.AnnPointerEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles pointer move events on the designer.
member.param: The container associated with this designer.
member.returns: Derived classes should override this method in order to process pointer move events on the container. The designer should return **true** if it handled this event in any way.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.OnPointerUp(Leadtools.Annotations.Core.AnnContainer,Leadtools.Annotations.Core.AnnPointerEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles pointer up events on the designer.
member.param: The container associated with this designer.
member.returns: Derived classes should override this method in order to process pointer up events on the container. The designer should return **true** if it handled this event in any way.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.SnapPointToGrid(Leadtools.LeadPointD,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Snaps the specified point to the container grid based on SnapToGridOptions.
member.param: A Boolean value to specify if we want to clip the point to container bounds after snap or no.
member.returns: point snapped to the container grid based on SnapToGridOptions.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.Start
member.summary: Starts this designer.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.ClipPoint(Leadtools.LeadPointD,Leadtools.LeadRectD)
member.summary: Clips the specified point.
member.returns: point clipped to the boundaries of the rectangle.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.AutomationControl
member.summary: Gets the automation control associated with this designer.
member.value: The automation control associated with this designer.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.FinalTargetObject
member.summary: Gets the final target object for this designer.
member.value: The final target object for this designer. Default implementation is to return TargetObject.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.HasStarted
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this designer has started.
member.value: **true** if this AnnDesigner has started; otherwise, it is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.IsMouseLeftButtonDown
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the left mouse button is currently down.
member.value: **true** if the left mouse button is currently down; otherwise, it is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.RestrictDesigners
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the object should be restricted to a point inside the rectangle set in ClipRectangle.
member.value: It is **true** if the object should be restricted to a point inside inside the rectangle set in ClipRectangle; otherwise, **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.SnapToGridOptions
member.summary: Gets the AnnSnapToGridOptions for this AnnDesigner.
member.value: The AnnSnapToGridOptions object for this AnnDesigner.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.TargetObject
member.summary: Gets or sets the target object for this designer.
member.value: The target object for this designer.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.ClipRectangle
member.summary: Gets the cursor clipping rectangle for this designer.
member.value: The cursor clipping rectangle for this designer. The default value of ClipRectangle is set to the location and boundary of the Container.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnDesigner.Container
member.summary: Gets the AnnContainer object for this AnnDesigner.
member.value: The AnnContainer object for this AnnDesigner.

member.summary: Starts drawing the TargetObject.

member.summary: Indicates whether this AnnDrawDesigner is currently drawing.

member.summary: Occurs when this AnnDrawDesigner object is drawing an AnnObject.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this AnnDrawDesigner is currently in extended mode.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this AnnDrawDesigner is currently in extended mode.

The new position of the thumb.

member.summary: Raises the Edit event.

member.summary: Begins editing.
member.param: The Index of the object being moved (or -1 if no thumb is being moved).

member.name: M:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnEditDesigner.Working
member.summary: Continues the editing process.
member.returns: For more information and an example, refer to Implement User Defined Objects with LEADTOOLS Annotations

member.name: E:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnEditDesigner.Edit
member.summary: Occurs when this AnnEditDesigner is editing an AnnObject.

member.name: E:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnEditDesigner.EditContent
member.summary: Occurs when this AnnEditDesigner is editing the content of an AnnObject.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnEditDesigner.IsModified
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this object has been modified.
member.value: **true** if the object has been modified; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnEditDesigner.MaintainAspectRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to preserve the aspect ratio when moving a corner thumb.
member.value: **true** to preserve the aspect ratio when moving a corner thumb; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnEditDesigner.MoveThumbIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the current thumb being moved.
member.value: The index of the current thumb being moved. The default value is -1.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnEditDesigner.Operation
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates which edit operation is currently being performed.
member.value: The current edit operation. The default value is AnnEditDesignerOperation.None.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnEditDesigner.RotateModifierKey
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the current auto-rotate modifier key.
member.value: the current auto-rotate modifier key. Default value is AnnKeys.None.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnEditDesigner.ShowThumbs
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to show the thumbs.
member.value: **true** to show the thumbs; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnEditDesigner.ThumbsHitTestBuffer
member.summary: Gets or sets the hit test buffer to use for the thumbs of this AnnEditDesigner.
member.value: The hit test buffer, in annotation coordinates, for the thumbs of this AnnEditDesigner. This must be a value greater than or equal to 0. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnEditDesigner.UseRotateThumbs
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to use the rotate thumbs of this AnnEditDesigner.
member.value: **true** to use the rotate thumbs of this AnnEditDesigner; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Annotations.Designers.AnnEditDesigner.WorkingBuffer
member.summary: Gets or sets the buffer to use for determining how far a OnPointerMove is from the previous OnPointerMove to be considered a legitimate move operation by the user and not an error due to sensitity.
member.value: The buffer to use for determining how far a OnPointerMove is from the previous OnPointerMove to be considered a legitimate move operation by the user and not an error due to sensitity. Default value is 2 pixels.
